recipesJson.name: Stoned On U'r Love  * All Flavorah
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
**Stoned on U'r Love**

Wow **Flavorah**, just some beautiful concentrates that you have created, I am in love and was already in love with your flavors.  So much fun developing recipes with these new flavors.  

This is a Lemonade Berry Wine Cooler.  Just perfect with Spring approaching in the States.  This is delicious.  

Adjust Sweetness to your preference.  Tested on Entheon RDA .27 ohm Dual Core Fused Clapton @58W  and Wasp Nano RDA .38 ohm Flat Twisted Coil @48W  
Learn more about mixing here:
facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/diydownunder/
Discord - https://discord.gg/kH4Fqbc
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTCwb7ULyfJALQlehomZZQA
website - https://www.diydownunder.com/

Music to listen to:

https://youtu.be/WVSWtcd283Q

Subscribe and watch Daytime Frank @2pm US EST on Sunday's https://www.youtube.com/user/frank1360
